titleInfo.title: Are we all disfluent in our own special way and should dialogue systems also be?

bibliographicCitation.apa: Betz, S., & Lopez Gambino, M. S. (2016). Are we all disfluent in our own special way and should dialogue systems also be? In O. Jokisch (Ed.), Studientexte zur Sprachkommunikation: Vol. 81. Elektronische Sprachsignalverarbeitung (ESSV) 2016 (pp. 168-174). Dresden: TUD Press.
bibliographicCitation.chicago: Betz, Simon, and Lopez Gambino, Maria Soledad. 2016. “Are we all disfluent in our own special way and should dialogue systems also be?”. In Elektronische Sprachsignalverarbeitung (ESSV) 2016, ed. Oliver Jokisch, 81:168-174. Studientexte zur Sprachkommunikation. Dresden: TUD Press.
